description: Row sums of array T in A055818; twice the odd-index Fibonacci numbers after initial term.
comments: Solutions (x, y) = (a(n), a(n+1)) satisfying  x^2 + y^2 = 3xy - 4. [Michel Lagneau, Feb 01 2014]Except for the first term, positive values of x (or y) satisfying x^2 - 18xy + y^2 + 256 = 0. - _Colin Barker_, Feb 16 2014
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-1).
formula: a(n) = 3*a(n-1)-a(n-2) for n>0. G.f.: -(x^2+x-1) / (x^2-3*x+1). - _Colin Barker_, Feb 01 2014a(n) = 2*A001519(n) for n>0. - _Colin Barker_, Feb 04 2014
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 - x - x^2)/(x^2 - 3 x + 1), {x, 0, 40}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Feb 05 2014 *)Join[{1},LinearRecurrence[{3,-1},{2,4},30]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 01 2014 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_, May 28 2000
